Class GEDMesgRecvImp

                    |
                    +--sentinel.ged.GEDMesgRecvImp
public class GEDMesgRecvImp
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements SentinelMesgRecv

This class provids the "onMessage" method for a remote invocation. The client can send the notification message or the detection request message by invoking "onMessage" method.

See Also:
